actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.
Reported to House from the Committee on the Judiciary, H. Rept. 93-1530.

official_title: A resolution to refer the bill (H.R. 15403) entitled "A bill for the relief of Marlin Toy Products, Incorporated", to the Chief Commissioner of the Court of Claims pursuant to sections 1492 and 2509 of title 28, United States Code, as amended.

summary.text: Refers H.R. 15403, entitled "A bill for the relief of Marlin Toy Products, Incorporated," to the Chief Commissioner of the United States Court of Claims, pursuant to sections 1492 and 2509 of Title 28, United States Code, as amended.

titles.title: A resolution to refer the bill (H.R. 15403) entitled "A bill for the relief of Marlin Toy Products, Incorporated", to the Chief Commissioner of the Court of Claims pursuant to sections 1492 and 2509 of title 28, United States Code, as amended.
